title: VÃDEOS: Mourinho expulso no empate do FenerbahÃ§e diante do Man United | MAISFUTEBOL
text: [Liga Europa](/liga-europa) VÃDEOS: Mourinho expulso no empate do FenerbahÃ§e diante do Man United Treinador reencontrou algumas caras conhecidas, mas acabou a ver o jogo da bancada Treinador reencontrou algumas caras conhecidas, mas acabou a ver o jogo da bancada O FenerbahÃ§e comandado por JosÃ© Mourinho empatou esta quinta-feira com o Manchester United ([1-1](https://maisfutebol.iol.pt/jogo/fenerbahce/manchester-united/13820334)), em Istambul, em jogo da terceira ronda da Liga Europa, que ficou marcou pela expulsÃ£o do treinador portuguÃªs no reencontro com a antiga equipa. JosÃ© Mourinho treinou o Manchester United de 2016 a 2019 e esta quinta-feira teve a oportunidade de reencontrar algumas caras conhecidas, mas o abraÃ§o mais caloroso foi com Casemiro, jogador que trabalhou com Mourinho ainda no Real Madrid. JÃ¡ com a bola a rolar, entrou melhor a equipa de Old Trafford com Diogo Dalot a titular, mas sem Bruno Fernandes, a cumprir o castigo ditado pela expulsÃ£o no DragÃ£o. A equipa de Erik ten Hag acabou por chegar Ã  vantagem aos 15 minutos, numa transiÃ§Ã£o rÃ¡pida conduzida por Zirkezee e finalizada com uma bomba de Eriksen Ã  entrada da Ã¡rea. Eriksen apareceu na hora certa Ã  entrada da Ã¡rea ðŸ˜Ž â€” DAZN Portugal (@DAZNPortugal) ðŸ¤©[@EuropaLeague]|[@Fenerbahce]0 x 1[@ManUtd][#DAZNEuropa][pic.twitter.com/lL27uNSTRh][October 24, 2024] O FenerbahÃ§e reagiu em forÃ§a e Mourinho desesperou quando viu Onana fazer uma dupla defesa incrÃ­vel que permitiu Ã  equipa inglesa chegar ao intervalo com a curta vantagem que tinha conseguido. No entanto, nÃ£o foi preciso esperar muitos minutos para a equipa turca chegar ao empate, logo a abrir a segunda parte, com Saint-Maximin a cruzar a bola da esquerda para En-Nesyri marcar de cabeÃ§a na Ã¡rea. En-Nesyri a fazÃª-la beijar as redes ðŸ˜´ â€” DAZN Portugal (@DAZNPortugal) ðŸ¤©[@EuropaLeague]|[@Fenerbahce]1 x 1[@ManUtd][#DAZNEuropa][pic.twitter.com/TqOrQmUklX][October 24, 2024] JosÃ© Mourinho festejou com um jovem apanha-bolas, mas, pouco depois, recebeu ordem de expulsÃ£o, com vermelho direto, por protestos, a reclamar um penÃ¡lti para a sua equipa. O treinador portuguÃªs subiu do banco para a bancada, onde assistiu ao resto do jogo que nÃ£o teve mais golos. Mourinho e um adjunto a questionarem-se sobre qual teria sido expulso ðŸ˜… â€” DAZN Portugal (@DAZNPortugal)[#DAZNEuropa][pic.twitter.com/6sXfqWRJm9][October 24, 2024] O FenerbahÃ§e, com 5 pontos, destaca-se no 14.Âº lugar da classificaÃ§Ã£o do novo formato da Liga Europa, enquanto o United, com trÃªs empates, ocupa um modesto 21.Âº posto

author: VNExplorer
title: Rain Likely To Spoil New Year's Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1
text:
Rain Likely To Spoil New Yearâ€™s Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1
New Delhi: The New Year is almost here, and youâ€™ve probably prepared to say bye to 2023 and hello to 2024. But, thereâ€™s a hitch â€“ rain might mess up your plans. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) says thereâ€™ll be heavy rain in many states in the next 3-4 days.
According to IMDâ€™s weather bulletin, light rainfall is likely over Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh from December 31 to Jan 2, 2024.
Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and East Rajasthan are also likely to witness rainfall during the next 2-3 days.
The IMD has predicted, light to moderate rainfall over south Tamil Nadu and Kerala from Dec 31 to Jan 3, 2024. Heavy rainfall is also likely over southern part of Tamil Nadu on Dec 31 and January 1, 2024.
Meanwhile, the dense fog continued to persist over Northwestern India lowering the visibility in several parts of the region. Dense to very dense fog blankets covered the many most parts of Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh and Delhi and some parts of Uttar Pradesh and isolated pockets over Jammu and Kashmir, Northwest Rajasthan and Northwest Madhya Pradesh.
Dense fog conditions are likely to persist in the above-mentioned regions, however, conditions may improve gradually from Dec 31, stated IMD.

author: Carol Cassada
title: The Bold and the Beautiful Has Destroyed Hope Logan | The Nerd Stash
text: Skip To... [The Bold and the Beautiful](https://thenerdstash.com/tag/the-bold-and-the-beautiful) heroine Hope Logan is a legacy character. As the daughter of the iconic vixen Brooke Logan, sheâ€™s the opposite of her mother. The young fashionista is the showâ€™s good girl, who serves to be a role model for others. Although the character has her loyal fans, sheâ€™s drawn mixed reactions from [soap opera](https://thenerdstash.com/tag/soap-opera/) viewers. This past year, sheâ€™s undergone a huge personality transformation. When Hope began dating Thomas Forrester, it was a new beginning for her. She was no long the meek girl who let everyone control her life. She became more independent and stood up for herself, which viewers loved. However, her behavior following her breakup with Thomas doesnâ€™t do the character any favors. Hope Logan is Pursuing a Married Man on The Bold and the Beautiful After Hope rejected another of Thomasâ€™ marriage proposals, he decided to leave town. She was devastated for about five minutes before she [set her sights on another man](https://thenerdstash.com/the-bold-and-the-beautiful-creates-drama-with-finn-and-hope-romance/). She and John â€œFinnâ€ Finnegan have become close as she sought his help with her migraines. Finnâ€™s magic fingers have awoken feelings in Hope because sheâ€™s got a crush on the handsome doctor. However, thereâ€™s a problem. Finn is married to Hopeâ€™s longtime nemesis Steffy Forrester. Miss Logan and Miss Forrester have been [embroiled in a feud](https://thenerdstash.com/the-bold-and-the-beautiful-teases-twist-in-steffy-and-hope-feud/) for over a decade. The source of their rivalry consisted of fighting over Liam Spencer. But now the two women will be fighting again with Hope pursuing Steffyâ€™s husband. This week Hope finally makes her move during a party at the Forrester mansion. A tipsy Hope gets Finn alone and kisses him, much to his shock. The Writing For the Character Doesnâ€™t Make Sense The kiss not only horrified Finn, who put Hope on blast, but also fans. On a That scene with Finn is making Hopeâ€™s character going low into the dumpster. Another viewer wrote: Iâ€™ve never been a fan of Hope but they are ruining her and if I was one of her fans Iâ€™d be furious at what theyâ€™re doing to her. The storyline of her chasing after Finn is ridiculous and makes her character look awful. Finn hasnâ€™t shown any romantic interest in her. The only thing heâ€™s done is defend and praise her to Steffy, which increases Miss Loganâ€™s infatuation. Although she told Brooke she wasnâ€™t a homewrecker, her kissing Finn says otherwise. It seems evident she wants to break up Steffy and Finnâ€™s marriage, but the question is why. Related: [The Young and the Restless & The Bold and the Beautiful Crossover Romances That Should Happen](https://thenerdstash.com/4-the-young-and-the-restless-the-bold-and-the-beautiful-crossover-romances-that-should-happen/) She and Steffy have been clashing at work because of the Hope for the Future line. With the clothing brand losing money, Steffy wants to cut it, but Hope and Brooke wonâ€™t allow it. Perhaps stealing Finn is her way of getting back at Steffy for taking everything away from her. Another possibility is that Hope has a diagnosed medical condition. Her constant headaches seemed to foreshadow health issues, but the writers have pursued that angle. She could have a brain tumor or a mental disorder, which Finn or Taylor Hayes can help her with. First, thereâ€™s the question of if she loves Finn. When [Thomas returned briefly](https://thenerdstash.com/is-matthew-atkinson-leaving-the-bold-and-the-beautiful-again-after-just-returning-from-break/) to Los Angeles, she was ecstatic to see him and tried to reconcile. But when rejected, she turned her attention back to Finn. Itâ€™s obvious that Hope doesnâ€™t know what she wants, and the writers donâ€™t know what to do with her. The storyline with Finn is a bomb, making the character look unstable and creepy. Unless something drastic changes, it appears things are going to worsen for Hope.

author: Agence France-Presse
title: Hospitalized Pope Francis has double pneumonia - Vatican
text:
Pope Francis gestures as he holds a holy mass at King Baudouin Stadium, in Brussels on September 29, 2024. FILE PHOTO/Agence France-Presse
VATICAN CITY, Holy See â€” Pope Francis, who was admitted to hospital last week, has developed pneumonia in both of his lungs, the Vatican said Tuesday, adding that the 88-year-old was in â€œgood spiritsâ€.
â€œThe laboratory tests, chest X-ray, and the Holy Fatherâ€™s clinical condition continue to present a complex pictureâ€, the Vatican said in a statement.
Article continues after this advertisement Francis was admitted to Romeâ€™s Gemelli hospital last Friday for bronchitis, but the Vatican on Monday said it was changing his treatment following tests.
READ: Pope has polymicrobial respiratory tract infection. What is that?
Article continues after this advertisement It said Tuesday that a â€œpolymicrobial infectionâ€ which has come on top of â€œbronchiectasis and asthmatic bronchitis, and which required the use of cortisone antibiotic therapy, makes therapeutic treatment more complexâ€.
Article continues after this advertisement â€œThe follow-up chest CT scan which the Holy Father underwent this afternoonâ€¦ demonstrated the onset of bilateral pneumonia, which required additional drug therapy,â€ it said.
Article continues after this advertisement The pontiff had part of his right lung cut away when he was 21, after developing pleurisy that almost killed him.
READ: Popeâ€™s condition â€˜complexâ€™, hospital stay extended: Vatican
Article continues after this advertisement The Vatican had already cancelled a papal audience on Saturday and said he would not attend a mass on Sunday, although it has yet to announce plans for his weekly Angelus prayer, held on Sunday.
â€œNevertheless, Pope Francis is in good spirits,â€ it added.
The pope spent his fifth day in hospital alternating rest with prayer and reading texts, the Vatican said.
Pilgrims pray Francis, the head of the Catholic Church since 2013, was admitted to hospital after struggling for several days to read his texts in public.
It is the latest of a series of health issues for the Jesuit, who has undergone hernia and colon surgery since 2021 and uses a wheelchair due to pain in his knee.
Among the pilgrims and tourists gathered in Saint Peterâ€™s Square on Tuesday, many said they were praying for the popeâ€™s recovery.
â€œI hope that heâ€™s getting better soon,â€ Birgit Jungreuthmayer, a 48-year-old Austrian tourist, told AFP.
Others gathered outside the Gemelli hospital, holding candles or saying prayers.
â€œI came to say a prayer for the pope so that he may recover soon. I send him my best wishesâ€, said Jacqueline Troncoso, a Bolivian resident in Rome.
The Vatican published drawings done by children in the hospital for Francis, as well as letters from parents asking him to pray for their sick offspring.
Francis â€œgives thanks for the closeness he feels at this time and asks, with a grateful heart, that we continue to pray for himâ€, it said.
Active schedule Despite his health troubles, Francis remains a very active pontiff, with a busy weekly schedule and regular overseas trips.
In September 2024, he completed a four-nation Asia-Pacific tour, the longest of his papacy by duration and distance.
A source within the popeâ€™s entourage had told AFP Monday that Francis was admitted after a â€œvery busyâ€ two weeks, during which â€œhe was weakenedâ€ â€” but insisted there was no alarm.
Francis followed last Sundayâ€™s mass on television from hospital and sent a written address for the Angelus.
â€œI would have liked to be among you but, as you know, I am here at the Gemelli hospital because I still need some treatment for my bronchitis,â€ Francis wrote.
The Jesuit has left open the option of resigning if he became unable to carry out his duties.
His predecessor, Benedict XVI, stunned the world in 2013 by becoming the first pope since the Middle Ages to step down, citing his ailing health.
But in a memoir published last year, Francis wrote that he did â€œnot have any cause serious enough to make me think of resigningâ€.
Stepping down is a â€œdistant possibilityâ€ that would be justified only in the event of â€œa serious physical impedimentâ€, he wrote.
Your subscription could not be saved. Please try again.

author: Camila Gonzalez Staff Writer
title: Mellow Mushroom closing after more than 13 years in downtown Denton | State | victoriaadvocate.com
text:
Pizza restaurant Mellow Mushroom announced Wednesday via social media that it will close "indefinitely" this Sunday.
Mellow Mushroom began in 1974 in Atlanta, Georgia, and has franchises throughout the country. The locally owned Denton location, at 217 E. Hickory St., opened in 2011 and became a staple restaurant for some folks. The restaurant is part of the Denton Main Street Association.
"Any time we see a business close downtown, it's definitely something that we don't like to see," association president Kristen Kendrick Bigley said Wednesday. "But there's many reasons why businesses make that decision."
Local residents have shared their thoughts on Mellow Mushroom closing and their memories of the restaurant.
University of North Texas alumnus and sports videographer David Horn said he remembers visiting the restaurant frequently with fellow members of coed service fraternity Alpha Phi Omega after service events and meetings.
"It was always a good environment," Horn said.
Denton-based vintage clothing vendor Jacob Kerstetter had mixed memories.
"The food always kind of took forever," Kerstetter said. "But their food was good, and I'll miss their Caesar salad pizza."
Jewelry vendor C. Mikita discovered Mellow Mushroom while vending at the Mosaic Market in 2023. This vendor market was held on the sidewalk outside the restaurant.
"Mellow Mushroom holds a very special place in my heart," Mikita said. "Without Mellow Mushroom, I would never have met some of my closest friends."
The restaurant will close on Sunday, so locals still have time to eat there one last time.

author: Cision
title: Clover Announces Positive Phase â…  Results for SCB-219M for Treatment of Chemotherapy-Induced Thrombocytopenia (CIT) | Kalkine Media
text: --All CIT patients maintained platelet counts >75 x 109/L at 1-week following chemotherapy plus a single dose of SCB-219M, with durable responses through at least 3-weeks-- --Durable efficacy and PK profile expected to support convenient dosing interval of Ã¢Â‰Â¥2-weeks, compared to daily or weekly dosing for current treatment options in China[1] and globally[2]-- --Phase Ã¢Â… b trial in CIT and CTIT (cancer treatment-induced thrombocytopenia) patients evaluating repeated dosing of SCB-219M is planned to initiate in 2024-- CHENGDU, China, Dec. 29, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Clover Biopharmaceuticals, Ltd. (Clover; HKEX: 02197), a global commercial-stage biotechnology company, today announced positive preliminary safety, efficacy and pharmacokinetics data in a Phase Ã¢Â… clinical trial evaluating SCB-219M, an innovative thrombopoietin receptor agonist (TPO-RA) mimetic bispecific Fc-fusion protein produced from CHO cells, for the treatment of cancer patients with chemotherapy-induced thrombocytopenia (CIT). All cancer patients enrolled to-date (n=9) receiving chemotherapy plus a single subcutaneous dose of SCB-219M observed platelet counts maintained or recovered at >75 x 109/L (threshold level for CIT) after one week, with responses durable through at least three weeks (i.e. through the chemotherapy cycle). In comparison, following administration of the same chemotherapy (but without SCB-219M) in the same cancer patients prior to enrolling into the trial, all evaluable patients had observed platelet counts drop to <75 x 109/L between one and three weeks. The durable preliminary efficacy and pharmacokinetic profile observed for SCB-219M are potentially supportive of dosing intervals Ã¢Â‰Â¥2-weeks. If further confirmed, this profile could enable convenient dosing of SCB-219M synchronized with any given patient's chemotherapy regimen, typically 2-3 weeks per cycle. A favorable safety and tolerability profile for SCB-219M has also been observed to-date, with no serious adverse events (SAEs) and no dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) identified. Dr. Yongsheng Wang, Associate Director of West China Hospital Cancer Center at Sichuan University and Principal Investigator for the SCB-219M Phase Ã¢Â… Trial commented: "We are encouraged by the Phase Ã¢Â… results to-date for SCB-219M, and we look forward to the continued evaluation of SCB-219M, as we believe the management of CIT remains a pressing unmet medical need for patients undergoing cancer treatment." "We are pleased to announce positive Phase Ã¢Â… results for SCB-219M demonstrating rapid and durable efficacy along with a favorable safety profile," said Dr. Peng Liang, Chairman, Chief Scientific Officer of Clover and inventor of SCB-219M. "The preliminary results suggest that SCB-219M has a potentially differentiated profile compared to the current standard of care treatments for CIT and CTIT. In contrast to current biologic treatment options for CIT in China requiring daily injections[1] and globally requiring weekly injections[2], the durable efficacy and pharmacokinetics of SCB-219M observed to-date could enable convenient dosing synchronized with any given patient's chemotherapy regimen." The Phase Ã¢Â… trial is a multi-center, open-label, dose escalation and dose expansion study, that is exploring the safety, tolerability, immunogenicity, pharmacokinetics, and efficacy of SCB-219M administered subcutaneously in cancer patients with CIT. In addition to West China Hospital Cancer Center at Sichuan University, other participating sites in this clinical trial include Sichuan Provincial People's Hospital and Chengdu No. 6 People's Hospital. A Phase Ã¢Â… b trial evaluating repeated dosing of SCB-219M in CIT and CTIT patients is planned to initiate in 2024. CIT is a serious, chemotherapy-associated complication observed in a wide range of cancer patients. Incidence of CIT can occur in greater than 50%[3] of patients undergoing standard chemotherapy regiments, and can have detrimental impacts on treatment outcome, resulting in chemotherapy dose delay or dose reduction, and potentially fatal bleeding events.

author: www.ETTelecom.com
title: Reliance Industries to be among the top 10 conglomerates in the world: Mukesh Ambani, ET Telecom
text: Oil-to-telecom conglomerate Reliance Industries (RIL) will be among the worldâ€™s top 10 business conglomerates, chairman Mukesh Ambani said on Thursday. Ambani however, did not give a timeline for the same. â€œWe are known for disrupting the market through constant innovation and reinvention. We have shown the courage to set the bar high and the ability to jump even higher to create new records,â€ Ambani said while addressing employees on Reliance Family Day, the birthday of group founder Dhirubhai Ambani.He added that his oil-chemicals-telecom conglomerate is aiming to secure its place among global leaders in digital data platforms and artificial intelligence (AI) adoption.â€œAs India races ahead to become the worldâ€™s third-largest economy, an unprecedented opportunity awaits Reliance. Reliance can â€¦. and Reliance will â€¦ grow to be among the Top 10 business conglomerates of the world. For this, we need to be laser-focused on three things,â€ he said.RIL is building giga-scale factories for its new energy businesses. In 2023 the company also forayed into financial services.â€œWe have shown the courage to set the bar high and the ability to jump even higher to create new records. This is how Reliance has achieved perennial growth,â€ Ambani said.Reliance is Indiaâ€™s largest corporation by market capitalization.Ambani said his three key messages for the New Year are to consolidate Relianceâ€™s place among global leaders in digital data platforms and AI adoption, consolidate its place among global leaders in talent enrichment, and secure its place among global leaders in institutional culture.\"In the era of digital platforms, data has become a new factor of production along with talent and money. We need to be at the forefront of using data, with AI as an enabler for achieving a quantum jump in productivity and efficiency,â€ he said.RIL's scrip ended at Rs 2605.80, up 0.75% on the BSE, Thursday. Benchmark Sensex ended 0.52% higher.

author: Staff Reporter
title: Decommissioning chairman wanted to quit in 2001 after slow progress â€“ records - Limerick Live
text: The chairman of the body in charge of decommissioning as part of Northern Irelandâ€™s peace process considered standing down from the role in June 2001 after months of slow progress. Documents released from Irelandâ€™s state files this year show a â€œdownbeatâ€ view of the pace of attempts to ensure the IRA and other paramilitary groups disabled their arms after the Good Friday Agreement. Officials from Irelandâ€™s Department of Justice and from the Northern Ireland Office (NIO) met the three commissioners of the Independent International Commission on Decommissioning (IICD) on June 27. Despite six meetings with the IRA representative since March, IICD chairman John de Chastelain said that â€œwe are no nearer actually decommissioningâ€. William Fittall of the NIO noted that, â€œmore provocativelyâ€, the three commissioners were proposing to be released from their roles by September 24, on its fourth anniversary. â€œJohn de Chastelain stressed that he and his colleagues did not want to be irresponsible or walk away from their commitments. But they had personal lives they needed to get on with.â€ He also expressed concern about the commissionâ€™s credibility given â€œthe impasse and growing unionist scepticismâ€. â€œThey thought that putting the date in the public domain might produce a helpful jolt to the system. â€œNevertheless, they were open to discussion on this. They understood that the governments might want the commission still to exist with a staff member there to answer the phones. â€œBut the present three commissioners did not want to remain in Belfast beyond September.â€ Mr Fittall noted that â€œtheir restlessness is something which we can exploit privately with Sinn Feinâ€. A week prior, Irish diplomat Niall Holohan recounted a meeting he had in Belfast with Clifford Garrard, who was Mr de Chastelainâ€™s deputy. Mr Garrard told Mr Holohan that the â€œwaiting gameâ€ had been â€œan exasperating experienceâ€ for the commission. â€œGarrard was of the view furthermore that nothing less than an act of putting arms completely and verifiably beyond use would be enough to save David Trimbleâ€™s scalp on July 1,â€ the note said. It added: â€œIf David Trimble proceeds with his threat to resign on July 1 and the Good Friday institutions were to collapse as a result, it might prove difficult for de Chastelain to justify his continued presence in Belfast.â€ The commission remained in place for four more years until it was verified that all IRA materiel was decommissioned. The material can be viewed in the National Archives in file 2023/155/6. Last yearâ€™s BD STEM Star winners Madison Saracoglu and Emma Greaney from Desmond College with Dr John Carey, senior manager, BD Research Centre Ireland Picture: Brian Arthur The funding is available through two programmes: the Community Climate Action Programme (CCAP) and SÃ­olta Glasa Subscribe or register today to discover more from DonegalLive.ie Buy the e-paper of the Donegal Democrat, Donegal People's Press, Donegal Post and Inish Times here for instant access to Donegal's premier news titles. author: @azuniga
title: 'Independiente estÃ¡ enamorado de Loyola': Periodista de ESPN - RedGol
text: Menos de un mes le tomÃ³ al defensor chileno [Felipe Loyola](https://redgol.cl/tema/felipe-loyola), consagrarse como uno de los jugadores revelaciÃ³n del [fÃºtbol argentino](https://redgol.cl/tema/futbol-argentino). Es que apenas suma cinco encuentros con la camiseta de [Independiente](https://redgol.cl/tema/independiente) y no para de recibir buenas crÃ­ticas de los hinchas y la prensa. En los Ãºltimos dÃ­as hemos sido testigos de cÃ³mo [los fanÃ¡ticos del Rojo de Avellaneda le regalaron una fuerte ovaciÃ³n](https://redgol.cl/internacional/felipe-loyola-independiente-hinchas-admiracion) al ex [Huachipato](https://redgol.cl/tema/huachipato) luego de la [igualdad sin goles ante River Plate](https://redgol.cl/internacional/independiente-de-felipe-loyola-vs-river-plate-de-paulo-diaz-por-fecha-13-de-futbol-argentino), donde pasÃ³ de jugar en el mediocampo a su puesto natural de lateral derecho. Y como sucede cada vez que un futbolista chileno tiene un buen desempeÃ±o al otro lado de la Cordillera, la prensa se encarga de ensalzarlo. AsÃ­ ocurre, por ejemplo, en la cadena ESPN, donde uno de sus periodistas, Leandro Alves, cumpliÃ³ con esa prerrogativa. Durante su presencia en el programa F90 para la seÃ±al chilena, se le consultÃ³ al comunicador por el buen presente de Loyola, y si bien se excusÃ³ en que no sigue la actualidad de Independiente, pues cubre habitualmente a [San Lorenzo](https://redgol.cl/tema/san-lorenzo), se encargÃ³ de hacerle un queque al nacional. Periodista argentino llena de flores a Felipe Loyola â€œYo no sigo a Independiente, pero uno ve los partidos y realmente ha sorprendido. Y lo que mÃ¡s se destaca es a su entrenador Julio Vaccari por mirarlo y traerlo al fÃºtbol argentinoâ€œ, asegura el popularmente conocido GurÃ­ sobre el chileno, para luego tirarle la pÃ©rgola completa. â€œUno ve a los periodistas que siguen al club y me dicen que los hinchas de Independiente estÃ¡n enamorados de Loyola. En cuatro partidos se metiÃ³ al hincha de Independiente en el bolsillo, y eso que es de las hinchadas mÃ¡s exigentes de Argentinaâ€. Los nÃºmeros del chileno en Independiente este 2024 El surgido en la cantera de [Colo Colo](https://redgol.cl/colocolo) es un reciÃ©n llegado al fÃºtbol argentino, y se ganÃ³ la buena crÃ­tica en base a su polifuncionalidad dentro de la cancha. Actualmente suma cinco encuentros como titular, en liga y copa, en todos jugÃ³ los 90 minutos y ya cuenta con una asistencia. Toda la actualidad del fÃºtbol chileno e internacional en la palma de tu mano. Sigue el grupo de [Google News](https://news.google.com/publications/caaqbwgkmn7q_wowh835ag?hl=es-419&gl=co&ceid=co%3aes-419).

author: Med Kharbach, PhD
title: Here Is How to Take a Picture on a Chromebook
text:
Chromebooks, as you probably know, are not just for browsing and typing up notes. They are also versatile tools for taking photos, recording videos, creating tutorials, and many more. Chromebooks are like having a mini photo/video studio right at your fingertips!
In todayâ€™s post, I am walking you through a step by step guide on how you can use Chromebookâ€™s built-in camera to take photos and videos. The process is straightforward and easy. Read on to learn more!
Related:
Best Snipping Tools for Chromebook
How to Take A Picture on a Chromebook
Hereâ€™s a simple guide on how to get the most out of the camera on your Chromebook:
- Starting Up: To kick things off, go to the corner of your screen and open the Launcher. Then, find and open the Camera app.
- Taking Photos and Videos:
- Snap a Photo: Choose the â€˜Photoâ€™ option and hit â€˜Take photoâ€™. Easy peasy!
- Portrait Mode: For those fancy shots with a blurred background, select â€˜Portraitâ€™ and then â€˜Take photoâ€™.
- Video Recording: To record a video, just select â€˜Videoâ€™ and then â€˜Start recordingâ€™.
- Square Photos: For a perfect square photo, choose â€˜Squareâ€™ and then take your shot.
- Scanning Documents: Need to digitize some documents or scan a QR code? Select â€˜Scanâ€™, then choose â€˜Documentâ€™ or â€˜QR codeâ€™, and finally â€˜Scanâ€™.
Getting Creative with Time-Lapse and GIFs:
- Time-Lapse Videos: Create a cool sped-up video by selecting â€˜Videoâ€™ and then â€˜Time Lapseâ€™.
- GIF Animations: For a quick, fun GIF, select â€˜Videoâ€™ and then â€˜GIFâ€™. Remember, shorter GIFs (up to 5 seconds) work best for sharing.
Customizing Your Shots:
- Settings Galore: Tweak your cameraâ€™s settings by selecting â€˜Settingsâ€™. Here, you can adjust the grid size, timer length, or camera resolution.
- Mirror Image: Flip your photo left to right with the â€˜Mirroringâ€™ option.
- Straighten Up: Use â€˜Gridâ€™ lines to align your shots perfectly.
- Switching Cameras: If your Chromebook has two cameras, or if youâ€™ve plugged in an external one, you can switch between them with â€˜Switch cameraâ€™.
- Timer Shots: Set a timer for your photos by selecting â€˜Timerâ€™.
- Volume Button Clicks: In tablet mode, use the volume buttons to snap a photo â€“ handy, right?
- Video Snapshot: While recording a video, you can take a snapshot by selecting â€˜Take video snapshotâ€™.
- Pause and Resume: You can pause a video recording and continue later, without losing the footage.
Advanced Camera Movements:
- Pan, Tilt, Zoom: If your camera supports it, select â€˜Pan, tilt, and zoomâ€™ for more control over your shots.
Remember, playing around with these settings can lead to some awesome classroom moments captured, or even help in creating educational content for your blogs. Each feature adds a little flair to your regular Chromebook camera, making it a versatile tool for both teaching and personal use.
